short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tweet about the current page with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes I want to tweet about the article or product currently looking at, but always have to copy the current URL.

This extension makes that process simple.

What's more:
Some links have tracking parameters, like source_id. Make sure to remove those. In short, check before you post.

Github Repo:
https://github.com/mefengl/sharefast

Credits:
Logo based on `streamline:twitter-solid` from https://www.streamlinehq.com, licensed under the CC BY 4.0 license.
